description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个内陆省份，位于中国中部偏北地区。因汉语拼音与邻省山西相同，为作区别，在西方语言中常作“Shaanxi”。
description.en: An inland province of the People's Republic of China, located in the north-central part of the country. To distinguish it from the neighboring province of Shanxi in Hanyu Pinyin, its name is often transliterated as 'Shaanxi' in Western languages.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共陕西省委书记、陕西省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the CPC Secretary of Shaanxi and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任陕西省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Governor of Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议陕西省委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 陕西省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 陕西省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 陕西省人民代表大会的常设机关，是陕西省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Congress, serving as the local organ of state power in Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议陕西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在陕西省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 周朝初年政治家，与召公奭划分领地，实行分陕而治。
description.en: An early statesman of the Zhou Dynasty who, along with the Duke of Shao, divided the territory for governance, known as 'Governing from Each Side of Shan'.

description.zh-cn: 周朝初年政治家，与周公旦划分领地，实行分陕而治。
description.en: An early statesman of the Zhou Dynasty who, along with the Duke of Zhou, divided the territory for governance, known as 'Governing from Each Side of Shan'.

description.zh-cn: 周朝初年，周公旦与召公奭以陕原为界划分治理区域的历史事件，陕西得名于此。
description.en: A historical event in the early Zhou Dynasty where the Duke of Zhou and the Duke of Shao divided their administrative territories at Shan Yuan, from which the name Shaanxi is derived.

description.zh-cn: 古代民族，曾攻破西周都城镐京，杀死周幽王。
description.en: An ancient ethnic group that sacked the Western Zhou capital Haojing and killed King You of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 西周第十二代君主，也是最后一代君主，被犬戎所杀。
description.en: The twelfth and last king of the Western Zhou Dynasty, killed by the Quanrong.

description.zh-cn: 秦国君主，因护送周平王东迁有功而被封为诸侯。
description.en: Ruler of the Qin state, who was enfeoffed as a feudal lord for his merit in escorting King Ping of Zhou eastward.

description.zh-cn: 东周第一代君主，在秦襄公护送下东迁雒邑。
description.en: The first king of the Eastern Zhou Dynasty, who moved the capital to Luoyi under the escort of Duke Xiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 前赵皇帝，攻破长安，俘虏晋愍帝，导致西晋灭亡。
description.en: Emperor of Former Zhao, who captured Chang'an and Emperor Min of Jin, leading to the fall of the Western Jin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西晋最后一位皇帝，被前赵将领刘曜俘虏。
description.en: The last emperor of the Western Jin Dynasty, captured by the Former Zhao general Liu Yao.

description.zh-cn: 十六国之一，由匈奴人刘渊建立。其军队攻破长安，灭亡西晋。
description.en: One of the Sixteen Kingdoms, founded by the Xiongnu Liu Yuan. Its forces captured Chang'an and destroyed the Western Jin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国朝代，在永嘉之乱后被前赵所灭。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that was overthrown by the Former Zhao after the Yongjia Disturbance.

description.zh-cn: 后秦开国皇帝，擒杀前秦天王苻坚。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Later Qin dynasty, who captured and killed Fu Jian, the ruler of Former Qin.

description.zh-cn: 前秦天王，在淝水之战中大败，后被姚苌擒杀。
description.en: Ruler of Former Qin, who was decisively defeated at the Battle of Fei River and later captured and killed by Yao Chang.

description.zh-cn: 十六国之一，由羌族贵族姚苌建立。
description.en: One of the Sixteen Kingdoms, founded by the Qiang nobleman Yao Chang.

description.zh-cn: 东晋与前秦之间的一场决定性战役，前秦大败，国力开始下降。
description.en: A decisive battle between the Eastern Jin and Former Qin. The defeat of Former Qin led to its decline.

description.zh-cn: 十六国之一，由氐族建立，在淝水之战后衰落。
description.en: One of the Sixteen Kingdoms, founded by the Di people, which declined after the Battle of Fei River.

description.zh-cn: 西魏权臣，后取代西魏建立北周。
description.en: A powerful official of the Western Wei who later replaced it by founding the Northern Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北方王朝之一，后被北周取代。
description.en: One of the Northern Dynasties during China's Northern and Southern dynasties period, later replaced by the Northern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北方王朝之一，由宇文泰建立。
description.en: One of the Northern Dynasties during China's Northern and Southern dynasties period, founded by Yuwen Tai.

description.zh-cn: 明末民变领袖，攻入西安后建立大顺政权。
description.en: A leader of a peasant rebellion in the late Ming Dynasty who founded the Shun dynasty after capturing Xi'an.

description.zh-cn: 明末李自成建立的政权。
description.en: A dynasty established by Li Zicheng at the end of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，于1949年逐步攻占陕西全境。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which gradually took control of the entire Shaanxi province in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1912年至1949年间统治中国大陆的政权。
description.en: The regime that ruled mainland China from 1912 to 1949.

description.zh-cn: 指1959年至1961年间中华人民共和国发生的大规模饥荒，期间陕西省有大量人口非正常死亡。
description.en: Refers to the widespread famine in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961, during which Shaanxi province experienced a significant number of excess deaths.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，习仲勋之子。
description.en: Chinese politician, son of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋之子，习近平之弟。
description.en: Son of Xi Zhongxun and younger brother of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，习近平和习远平的父亲。
description.en: A former key leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, father of Xi Jinping and Xi Yuanping.

relationships.target: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 赵一德担任中国共产党陕西省委员会书记。
description.en: Zhao Yide serves as the Secretary of the CPC Shaanxi Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 陕西省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 赵一德担任陕西省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Zhao Yide serves as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 赵刚担任陕西省人民政府省长。
description.en: Zhao Gang serves as the Governor of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 徐新荣担任中国人民政治协商会议陕西省委员会主席。
description.en: Xu Xinrong serves as the Chairman of the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 周公旦与召公奭以陕原为界，划分治理区域，史称“分陕而治”。
description.en: The Duke of Zhou and the Duke of Shao divided their administrative territories at Shan Yuan, a historical event known as 'Governing from Each Side of Shan'.

description.zh-cn: 召公奭与周公旦以陕原为界，划分治理区域，史称“分陕而治”。
description.en: The Duke of Shao and the Duke of Zhou divided their administrative territories at Shan Yuan, a historical event known as 'Governing from Each Side of Shan'.

description.zh-cn: 公元前771年，犬戎攻破西周都城镐京，杀死了周幽王。
description.en: In 771 BC, the Quanrong sacked the Western Zhou capital Haojing and killed King You of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 秦襄公护送周平王东迁雒邑。
description.en: Duke Xiang of Qin escorted King Ping of Zhou on his eastward move to Luoyi.

description.zh-cn: 316年，前赵将领刘曜攻破长安，俘虏了晋愍帝。
description.en: In 316, the Former Zhao general Liu Yao captured Chang'an and took Emperor Min of Jin prisoner.

description.zh-cn: 前赵灭亡了西晋。
description.en: The Former Zhao dynasty overthrew the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 前秦在淝水之战中大败，国力开始下降。
description.en: Former Qin was decisively defeated at the Battle of Fei River, leading to the decline of its power.

description.zh-cn: 385年，姚苌擒杀前秦天王苻坚。
description.en: In 385, Yao Chang captured and killed Fu Jian, the ruler of Former Qin.

description.zh-cn: 384年，姚苌自称万年秦王，建立后秦政权。
description.en: In 384, Yao Chang proclaimed himself King of Wannian Qin and established the Later Qin regime.

description.zh-cn: 556年，宇文泰的势力取代了西魏。
description.en: In 556, Yuwen Tai's faction replaced the Western Wei.

description.zh-cn: 556年，宇文泰的继承者建立了北周。
description.en: In 556, the successor of Yuwen Tai established the Northern Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1643年，李自成在西安建立大顺政权。
description.en: In 1643, Li Zicheng established the Shun regime in Xi'an.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，中国共产党领导的军队逐步攻占陕西全境，取代了中华民国的统治。
description.en: In 1949, forces led by the Communist Party of China gradually captured the entire territory of Shaanxi, replacing the rule of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年至1961年的三年困难时期，陕西全省共18.7万人非正常死亡。
description.en: During the Three Years of Great Famine from 1959 to 1961, a total of 187,000 people died of unnatural causes in Shaanxi province.

description.zh-cn: 习近平是习仲勋的儿子。
description.en: Xi Jinping is the son of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 习远平是习仲勋的儿子。
description.en: Xi Yuanping is the son of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 习远平是习近平的弟弟。
description.en: Xi Yuanping is the younger brother of Xi Jinping.
